original_text:
so he will sprinkle many nations,
    and kings will shut their mouths because of him.
For what they were not told, they will see,
    and what they have not heard, they will understand.
korean_text: 그가 나라들을 놀라게 할 것이며 왕들은 그로 말미암아 그들의 입을 봉하리니 이는 그들이 아직 그들에게 전파되지 아니한 것을 볼 것이요 아직 듣지 못한 것을 깨달을 것임이라

sentences.original_text: so he will sprinkle many nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그가 많은 민족에게 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: and kings will shut their mouths because of him
sentences.korean_translation: 왕들이 그로 인하여 입을 닫을 것이니

sentences.original_text: For what they were not told, they will see
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 듣지 못한 것을 볼 것이요

sentences.original_text: and what they have not heard, they will understand
